Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties

Interface EntityPropertyRegistryProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultEntityPropertyRegistryProvider
public interface EntityPropertyRegistryProvider
Central API for retrieving a MutableEntityPropertyRegistry for a particular entity type.
Since:
2.0.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme
See Also:
  • DefaultEntityPropertyRegistryProvider

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    MutableEntityPropertyRegistry
    create(Class<?> entityType)
    Create a new registry that uses this provider for nested lookups The newly created registry will not be added to the provider itself, calls to this method will always return a new instance.
    MutableEntityPropertyRegistry
    createForParentRegistry(EntityPropertyRegistry entityPropertyRegistry)
    Creates a new registry that uses the existing as parent.
    MutableEntityPropertyRegistry
    get(Class<?> entityType)
    Retrieve the property registry for the given entity type.

  • Method Details

    • get

      MutableEntityPropertyRegistry get(Class<?> entityType)
      Retrieve the property registry for the given entity type. Usually the registry will be created upon the first call. Calls to this method should always return the same instance.
      Parameters:
      entityType - for which to retrieve the property registry
      Returns:
      registry instance
      See Also:
      • create(Class)

    • create

      MutableEntityPropertyRegistry create(Class<?> entityType)
      Create a new registry that uses this provider for nested lookups The newly created registry will not be added to the provider itself, calls to this method will always return a new instance.
      Parameters:
      entityType - for which to create a new property registry
      Returns:
      new registry instance
      See Also:
      • get(Class)

    • createForParentRegistry

      MutableEntityPropertyRegistry createForParentRegistry(EntityPropertyRegistry entityPropertyRegistry)
      Creates a new registry that uses the existing as parent. Will usually return a MergingEntityPropertyRegistry where the property descriptors are also inherited.
      Parameters:
      entityPropertyRegistry - that is the parent
      Returns:
      new registry instance for the parent source
